title: Bug 116744Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text content type does not have any effect on the displayed results. Regardless of whether the Content Type property is set to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the report always shows the same results. This applies specifically to the attached report.
EB:
The expected behavior is as follows:
- When the Content Type is set to Plain, the literal content (including tags) should be displayed.
- When the Content Type is set to Auto, the content 1, 2, and 3 should appear properly without any HTML or RTF tags.
- When the Content Type is set to HTML, content 1 and 2 should appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 should appear as it is with RTF tags.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the attached report.
2. Set the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto.
3. Observe the displayed results.
4. Repeat the above steps by setting the Content Type to Plain and HTML respectively.
5. Compare the displayed results with the expected behavior mentioned above.
